message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. It comes with a variety of features designed to enhance your experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering it to you for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on providing exceptional products to our customers. I hope you find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality and features of your product. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $120. I hope this aligns better with my budget while still acknowledging the value of your product.

Thank you for your thoughtful response, Bob. I understand your budget considerations and appreciate your interest in our product. In light of that, I would like to extend a counteroffer of $140 for the product. This price reflects a balance between the value of the product and your budget constraints. I hope this offer is acceptable to you, and I look forward to your feedback.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I've given it careful consideration, and I would like to propose a counteroffer of $130. This price still acknowledges the value of your product while staying within my budget constraints. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're able to offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. In response to your counteroffer, I would like to propose a price of $135 for the product. This slightly increases the price from your last offer, aiming to reflect the value of our product while remaining competitive. I hope this offer is more in line with your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. After further consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $130. I believe this price strikes a good balance between the value of your product and my budget. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can come to an agreement.
